dialogues.content: 接下来，你会收到一系列原始英文文本和不知道是否正确的翻译版本，你要判断这个翻译是否正确，如果译文与原文意思大致吻合，返回{It's correct translation, so I return 0}，如果译文与原文意思完全不相干，则返回{Translation is not correcrt, so I return 1},你只能在这两种回答中选择一种，不要废话！！

['Original text': 'I have three tickets.
', 'Translated text': '
 I have three tickets.']
It's correct translation, so I return 0

['Original text': 'Does your salary get put on your pay card on a monthly basis?
', 'Translated text': '
 Yes, my salary is typically put on my pay card on a monthly basis.']
Translation is not correcrt, so I return 1

['Original text': 'Do you have any free time?
', 'Translated text': '
 Yes, what can I help you?']
It's correct translation, so I return 0

['Original text': 'Nice wether today!
', 'Translated text': '
 今天真是个好天气！']
Translation is not correcrt, so I return 1
